title: The Rub
description: Working for the Hong family, Van finds himself the object of Mrs Hong's affections; Pascalle suffers through the indignity of working for a living; Cheryl sticks up for her fellow checkout chicks and learns that being on the right side of the law doesn't necessarily mean being honest.

title: The Cause of This Defect
description: Eric's son Billy 'The Kid' Grady West dies in a misfortunate wheelie bin accident which gets Wolf released from prison to attend the burial. He manages to persuade the security guard, Paul, to let him go to the wake where Wolf rekindles his relationship with Cheryl and Loretta decides that Paul will do nicely in her attempt to lose her virginity and get Pascalle off her back. Wolf tells Jethro he is disappointed in him and then heads back to prison but not before Van tries to break Wolf out. Wolf tells him to go back home and look after Cheryl. Later, Cheryl talks to ...

title: The Infants of Spring
description: Cheryl has sunk to an all time low and her kids become worried about her so they each resolve to do their bit to help out. Of course, being Wests, this 'help' isn't without an element of self-interest. Pascalle decides to become a stripper at The Champagne Club on the advice of club owner Robby who tells her it will get her modeling contracts. Van goes to Wolf about Cheryl who is less than sympathetic and is more keen to set up Van on another 'dodgy' job. Van also has his problems with Mrs. Hong and Mr. Hong's daughter Tracey which could lead to Mr. Hong doing great ...

title: The Fat Weed That Roots Itself
To Be Honest as This World Goes
Go, Bid the Soldiers Shoot
description: Van and Draska are kicked out of the Doslic family home and are also on the run from the law. Despite this, Draska is still determined to carry on with the wedding and enlists Pascalle as her bridesmaid. Cheryl has bottomed out but finds Judd may be Van's saviour. So Cheryl delivers an ultimatum to Wolf, if he uses the evidence against Judd in his appeal, then Van will go to jail - and if Van goes to jail, then Cheryl won't be waiting for Wolf when he gets out. Wolf is not thrilled at this deal and he puts pressure on Jethro to make sure Van does the right thing. ...

title: The Secrets of My Prison House
All That Fortune, Death and Danger Dare
The Steep and Thorny Way to Heaven
To Be, or Not to Be
The Indifferent Children of the Earth
An Old Man Is Twice a Child
Outrageous Fortune: The Movie
description: It's Christmas 2006. Wolf's in prison to stay, Judd's in prison and trying to get out. The family is going to Tutaekuri Bay, where they go to every year - only some things have changed. Who is that in "their" spot? Who put a gate up stopping access to "their" beach? Who will win the bet on when Pascalle will give it up? And why do they always come here in the first place?

title: What Loss Your Honour May Sustain
Most True, She Is a Strumpet
Put the Strong Law on Him
Good Friends, as You Are Friends
A Jig or a Tale of Bawdry
Thinking Makes It So
description: Cheryl fights a child for a child, as a Wolf comes knocking at her door. And one of the Wests has amazing super powers.

title: As Much Containing
description: Pascalle organises a memorial for Milt. A shipping container arrives at Hoochie Mama. Jethro tries to beat Wolf at his own game, but gets in over his head. Ted makes a resolution.

title: Revenged Most Thoroughly
description: Danielle makes a decision after the fallout from Jethro's problem turns nasty. Judd & Loretta dig into Rita's past for Ted, and Gary Savage's father is revealed. Sheree gets a new job, with unexpected results. Cheryl & Wolf trade insults.

title: Remorseless, Treacherous, Lecherous
description: Pascalle & Cheryl are suspicious of Loretta's new look. Wolf & Loretta lock horns, and Loretta uses Sparky to get the upper hand. Van & Munter take on some work for Wolf.

title: A Good Child and a True Gentleman
description: Cheryl puts her back out, and Wolf tries to take advantage. Pascalle is overextended, and Baby Jane goes missing, but help arrives from someone unexpected. Sheree manipulates Wolf, but Van & Munter get caught in the crossfire.

title: What Is a Man?
description: Ted encourages Judd to find an outlet for his 'sperm buildup'. Van & Munter have unexpected competition in their trade, and neither are able to stick to their 'code'. Loretta sees an opportunity for herself in Van & Munter's business.

title: Guilty Creatures
description: The Inland Revenue Department visits Hoochie Mama, and Cheryl debates whether to come clean. Loretta does a deal with Sheree's brother, which arouses Wolf's suspicion. Kasey and the IRD woman hit it off, and things go further than expected.

title: Most Foul, Strange and Unnatural
description: Loretta & Nicky try to get Wolf onside with their plan, but Wolf reconsiders his priorities. Munter's lack of fidelity is revealed. Wolf tries to look out for Loretta, but she is reluctant to listen. Cheryl and Wolf bond over the children.

title: The King, the King's to Blame
description: It's Kasey's birthday so Munter & Van avoid the party, with Judd. Wolf lands in prison, and tries to figure out how. Loretta gets help from an unexpected source in her war with Wolf. Cheryl & Wolf get close, but others are unhappy about it.

title: Most Valiant
description: Van & Judd try to convince Munter to make up with Kasey. Cheryl admits her feelings for Wolf to Pascalle. Loretta makes Sheree homeless, causing a rift between Nicky & Loretta. Sheree is rescued by Pascalle, who finds out her secret.

title: Let Them Throw Millions
description: Pascalle's inheritance from Milt comes through, and several vultures are circling. Van hears about 'the night' from Sheree, but has trouble remembering. Loretta looks to come home, but gets left out in the cold. Sheree & Nicky hatch a plan.

title: Your Chaste Treasure
description: Kasey tries to get over Munter by going out with Dane Harris. Ted shows he's not over the hill by taking on a jeweller, and Loretta feels forced to help. Aaron Spiller gets beaten up for Munter, who he annoys, but Van sees the upside.

title: A Sister Driven Into Desperate Terms
The Fatness of These Pursy Times
O Wonderful Son (That Can So Astonish a Mother)
What a Rash and Bloody Deed Is This
description: The West family - minus Cheryl - arrive home to break the police cordon tape and survey the damage from Loretta's wedding day.

title: Do Your Mother's Commandment
description: Pascalle tries to take over Cheryl's role in the household. Eric wears out his welcome. Bailey tries to represent the entire family. Van tries to get more personal with Bailey.

title: To a Radiant Angel Link'd
description: Loretta struggles with Jane's care and accepts help from Ted and Ngaire. Pascalle looks for work, making a headache for Judd. Loretta finds a new business opportunity.

title: Make Mad the Guilty and Appal the Free
description: Cheryl tries to help a girl who is being bullied. Kasey and Rochelle discover a new talent for debt collecting.

title: The Power to Seduce
description: Rochelle and Kasey take on a new debt-collecting assignment. Van pursues Bailey, while Bailey pursues Jethro. Loretta discovers her husband's new business venture with Grandpa and Ngaire.

title: When Both Contend
description: Van and Jethro discover their common love interest. Rochelle goes missing. Munter is worried about Kasey continuing to work so late in her pregnancy and not getting ready for the baby to arrive.

title: Go Seek Him Out
description: Nicky is sentenced. Pascalle takes it hard and goes on a drinking binge. Police go on the hunt after Nicky and others escape from prison, but Nicky appears to have left the country.

title: Help, Help, Ho!
description: Loretta has problems with her 'girls'. Hayden tries to help her. Munter struggles to adjust to being a house-dad when Casey returns to work, Van feels overworked, and Aaron comes to the rescue.

title: Follow Her Close
description: Pascalle hides her liaisons from the family. Judd gets suspicious. Grandpa celebrates being a free man once again. A nasty surprise awaits, and Pascalle has to make a choice.

title: Thy Loving Father
description: Judd finds the twins. Loretta looks for a brothel. Van gets a new job.

title: Make Love to This Employment
description: Grandpa bumps into an old colleague. Van starts learning the management ropes. Loretta uses the Tool Guys to remodel the new brothel. Wayne has difficulty with the quote for the brothel's security system.

title: Let the Door Be Lock'd
description: Cheryl's man-eating sister Mandy, who always wants what Cheryl has, comes to town.

title: Look Here, Upon This Picture
description: "Loretta's" has its opening night. Van enrolls at the local Polytech to learn how to run a business. Wayne and Pascalle find it difficult being in the same room. Cheryl has good news.

title: Their Grand Commission
description: Van searches for his nude model. Munter takes on the challenge of managing the Tool Guys and keeping Van under control. Draska pushes her weight around. Cheryl comes up with a cunning plan to help a friend out in the prison.

title: Desperate Undertakings
description: Van is desperate to raise money. Loretta employs Pascalle. Jane is kicked out of Day Care.

title: Give Me Up the Truth
description: Grandpa gets back into the family business. Bailey practices courtroom interrogation with Pascalle. Cheryl and Draska become cell-mates. Loretta makes a startling discovery about Jethro's business partners. Wayne comes clean.

title: Blood and Judgment
description: The Wests seek revenge against Wayne. Cheryl takes Draska up on an offer. New information comes to hand that could affect the court case.
